summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, authorizing a water main system franchise Amendment 2 to Utility Franchise No. 5706 from the State of Washington, Department of Transportation for the construction, operation and maintenance of an 8-inch and 12-inch ductile iron water main system in a portion of SR 522 (Bothell Way Northeast) between Northeast 145th Street and Northeast 155th Street in King County.
